alert.note: Alert for Koochiching; North Itasca (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 15 at 5:29AM CST until December 15 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM CST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations of 2 to 5 inches. * WHERE...Koochiching and North Itasca Counties. This includes the Tribal Lands of the Bois Forte Band, Nett Lake and, Deer Creek areas. * WHEN...Until 6 PM CST this evening. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions will impact the morning commute.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1. Road conditions can also be found at 511mn.org for Minnesota or 511wi.gov for Wisconsin.
